Encounter.Name: Terrain Encounter
Encounter.Description: The Underdark contains dangerous hazards and wondrous terrain. Special terrain rules are explained after the table.

Encounter.Name: Creature Encounter
Encounter.Description: Keep the party's level in mind when fleshing out these encounters, and allow the characters to retreat from or avoid an encounter that is too great a challenge. Escape should come at a cost, however. Characters fleeing their camp to avoid a creature encounter might be forced to abandon food and water supplies, for example.

Encounter.Name: Terrain and Creature Encounter
Encounter.Description: Keep the party's level in mind when fleshing out these encounters, and allow the characters to retreat from or avoid an encounter that is too great a challenge. Escape should come at a cost, however. Characters fleeing their camp to avoid a creature encounter might be forced to abandon food and water supplies, for example.
